moves.1. e4 c5 2. Nf3 d6 3. h3: sicilin up to here. not sure what i was thinking now... was this JUST to avoid knight pin from Bg4? bit defensive for this early on
moves.3... Nf6 4. c3: prepare for d4 and protects Nxe4
moves.5. Qa4+ Qd7 6. Qxe4 d5 7. Qe3 b6 8. a4: preparing to play Bb5 pinning Q to K
moves.8... Nc6 9. Ne5: knight on c6 is in the road of the pin from Bb5, attack it!
moves.11... Qd7 12. Bxd7+ Bxd7 13. d4: open up Bc1. happy to hang pawn after trade cxd4, cxd4
moves.14. Rxa4 e6 15. Qe2:
notice there is a check from b5 and if first play 16. Bg5 then 16. Qb5 is checkmate. 
if black tries to defend 16. Bg5 f6 then 17. Qe6  opens everything for white
moves.15... b5 16. Bg5: happy to leave R as bait...
